original_title: A Green Good-Bye: She & Her Mobile
overview: A cell phone is with a girl for three and a half years and is dissatisfied with the girl's stubborn personality and oversleeping. Still, it likes the girl. One day, the girl meets a college student working at a bookstore. The cell phone gets jealous of her new companion begins to feel increasingly alienated.
title: A Green Good-Bye: She & Her Mobile
